title: Maridatha yesu Nathan
content:
1 - Maridatha yesu Nathan

Maridatha yesu Nathan
Mattum nintae vethana
Papathalum rogathalum
Kalangidaenda kadannu vah

Chorus:

Kadannu vaahâ€¦ kadannu vaan
Yesu ninnae villikkunu

Logathin param chumakkum
Yesuvingil nee kadannu vaah
Thalarn nintae antharathma
Klesam neekum kadannu vaah

Loga bandam kaivediyum
Drohichu ninae puranthallum
Pravannan kadannu vaan
Arikilundu neekum kadannu vaan

title: Yeshuvin thiru pathathil, irunnu kelkanaam
content:
2 - Yeshuvin thiru pathathil, irunnu kelkanaam

Yeshuvin thiru pathathil, irunnu kelkanaam
Thanthey vishutah vaakkyangal
Nammuday Jeevanam
Yesuvin Shuvishesham
Divyamaam upadesham

Kelkuka naam, kakuka naam
Jeevanday vaakyangal
Kelkuka naam, kakuka naam
Jeevanday vaakyangal

Deva vachnam jeevanum
Shathiyam aakaayaal
Aathma raksha undevanum
Ullathil kaikondaal
Aathma maranam maarum
Neethiyil avan varhum

Lokavum avasanikkum
Vanavan illatham
Deiva vaakum premaanikkum
Bhakthano nithyanaam
Vattam malinyam naasham
Ilathora vakaasham

title: Vishwasathiennum munnerum nyan
content:
3 - Vishwasathiennum munnerum nyan

Vishwasathiennum munnerum nyan
Vishwasathil ennum cheytheedum nyan
Onnum aasadyama yillente mumbilini
Jayam enikkundu

Chorus:

Nyan ottum pinmarkkilla viswasa chuvadukal
Mumbottu mumbottu
Aarellam ehirthaalum enthellam bhavichaalum
Pinmarukillini nyan
Adhikarathode ini kalpikkum nyan
Prathikoolangal maripokum
Onnum aasadyama yillente mumbilini
Jayam enikkundu

Rogathino ini shaapathino
Paapathino nyan adeema yalla
Saathaanya shakthiyin mel
Shaapa bandanathin mel jayan enikkund

title: Yenni yenni sthuthikuvon
content:
4 - Yenni yenni sthuthikuvon

Yenni yenni sthuthikuvon
Yennamillatha kripakalkaai
Innayolam than bhujathal
Yenne thangiya naamamae

Panjadukkum vairiyin
Kannin minpil patharathey
Kanmani pol kakkum karangal
Ninne moodi marachillae

Yordan kalangi mariyum
Jeevitha bharangal
Eliyavin puthapevidey
Nintey viswasa sothanayil

title: Sarva srushtikalumonnai pukazhthidunna
content:
5 - Sarva srushtikalumonnai pukazhthidunna

Sarva srushtikalumonnai pukazhthidunna
Srishtavine sthuthikkum nyan
Ee shonithalathil jeevikunna naalellaam
Khoshichedum ponnu naadane

Yesu maaraathavan, Yesu maaraathavan,
Yesu maaraathavan, Haa ethra nallvan,
Innum yennum koodayullavan

Rogashayyayilenikku sahayakanum
Raakkaala geethamumavan
Nalla vaidhyanum, divya aushadhavumen
Aathma sagiyun avan thane

title: Varuvin eenalla samayam vridaavaakkaatha
content:
6 - Varuvin eenalla samayam vridaavaakkaatha

Varuvin eenalla samayam vridaavaakkaatha
Ninne Yeshu villchidunnu

Vaanathin keezhae bhoomi me-the
Vaanavaneshu naamameene
Rakshippaan maargam verayilla
Rakshakan Yeshu than vazhiye

Theeraatha paapam vyadiyeyum
Maaraatha ellaa balaheenavum
Khorakurishil chumannu nine
Soukiyamaakki than adipinaraal

Sathyavachanam kettu nee vaa
Nithyajeevan ninnakekidumay
Nin peru jeevapusthkathil
Unmayai innum ezhutheedumay

title: Paadi pukazhthidaam Deva devanay
content:
7 - Paadi pukazhthidaam Deva devanay

Paadi pukazhthidaam Deva devanay
Puthiyathaam kripakalode
Innaluyuminnum maaraa Yeshuvve
Naam paadi puakzhthaam (2)

Yeshu enna namame
ennaathmaavin geethame
En priya Yeshuve nyan ennum
Vaazhthi pukazhthidume (2)

Khorabayankara kaattum alayum
Kodiyathaai varum nerathil
Kaakkum karangalal cherthu maarvanacha
Sneham nithyam paadum nyan (2)

title: Karutunnavan nyan alleyo
content:
8 - Karutunnavan nyan alleyo

Chorus:
Karutunnavan nyan alleyo
Kalangunnathenduni nee
Kannuneerinte thazhvarayil
Kaividukayilla nyan ninne (2)

Ente mahathram kannuka nee
Ente kayil tharika nine
Ente shakthi nyan ninnil pakarnnu
Ennum nadathidum kripayal (2)

Abbrahaaminde Daivamalleyo
Athbtham nyam cheykayilleyo
Chengadalilum vazhi thurappan
Nyan ennum shakthanalleyo (2)

title: Praarthanakkutharam nalkunnone
content:
9 - Praarthanakkutharam nalkunnone

Praarthanakkutharam nalkunnone
Ninte sannidiyil nyan varunne
Swargeeyannugraha bhandaarathin
Vaathil thurkkoname

Kelkanee en praarthanaa
Nalkanee en yachana

Paapavum rogavum akatteeduma
Rudhirathin adbutha shakthiyinnu
Ariyuvaanivie vishwasathinte
Hridhayangal thruakkename (2)

Puthramente naamathil chodhikkumbol
Utharam tharumennaruliyone
Neekam varaatha nin vaagdathamen
Perkku nee thannuvallo (2)

title: Aaswathin uravidamaam Kristhu
content:
10 - Aaswathin uravidamaam Kristhu

Chorus:
Aaswathin uravidamaam Kristhu
Ninne vilichidunnu (2)

Adwana bhaarathaal valayunnore
Aazhwaasamillaathe alayunnore
Aanipaadullavan karangal neeti
Nine vilichidunnu (2)

Paapandakarathil kazhiyunnore
Rogangalaal manam thakarnnavare
Ninne rakshipaan avan karangal
Ennennum mathiyayava (2)

Vaathilkal vanthingu muttidunna
Aashwara marulan vannidunna
Arumapithavinde imbaswaram
Nee innu shrawicheedumo (2)

title: Ee parikshakal needavayalla
content:
11 - Ee parikshakal needavayalla

Ee parikshakal needavayalla
Ee nerukkangal nithyavumalla
Ee kodunkaattum neeleekayilla
Parihaaram vaikukayill

Ee parikshakal nyan jayichidum
Athineeshu than balam tharum
Ee kaarmegam maaripokum
Enneshuvin mahathvam kaanum

Ee parikshkal nanmakkai maaridum
Yeshuvodothu enne nyan
Tholkkukayilla nyan thokukayilla
En Yeshuvin mahathvan kaanum

title: Daivakripayil nyan aashryayichu
content:
12 - Daivakripayil nyan aashryayichu

Chorus:
Daivakripayil nyan aashryayichu
Avan vazhilkale nyan arinju
Anugamicheedum avanude chuvadukale
Anugamicheedum avanude chuvadukale

Mano vedhana pala shodhana
Mama jeevitha paathayathil
Maratheidumbol athmanadanavan
Maaril chaari nyan aashwasikkum (2)

Ethra nallavan mathiyaayavan
Enne karuthunna karthanaanavan
Ente avashyankal ellam arinjidunna
Eettam adutha sahayakam than (2)

title: Daiva sneham varnicheedaan
content:
13 - Daiva sneham varnicheedaan

Chorus:
Daiva sneham varnicheedaan
Vaakkukal poraa
Nanni cholli theerkuvaani jeevitham poraa

Kashtapaadin kaalangalil
Rakshikunna sneham orthaal
Ethra stutichaalum mathivarumo

Swapnanagal polinjhalum
Dhukhanthaal valajhalum
Mithranngal akanthaalum
Shathrukkal nirannaalum
Rakshakavatham nee maarathennalum
Angen mumbe poyaal bhayamevide
